subject: Speedskating
World Cup (Skiing)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Shani Davis had his 15-race winning streak in the men’s 1,000 meters end, in the speedskating World Cup in Obihiro, Japan.
snippet: The Olympic champion Shani Davis had his 15-race winning streak in the men’s 1,000 meters end, in the speedskating World Cup in Obihiro, Japan.
